en: Why standest thou afar off, O Jehovah? Why hidest thou thyself in times of trouble?
hmr: Aw LALPA, iengdinga hla- takah i ngîr hlak am a na? Iengdinga lunginzîng hun laia inbi hlak am i na?

en: In the pride of the wicked the poor is hotly pursued; Let them be taken in the devices that they have conceived.
hmr: Mi rilohai chapona leiin mi rimsihai chu hnawt zêkin an um hlak a; An thil suol ngaituo suokhaia chun anni ngei âwk raw se.

en: For the wicked boasteth of his heart’s desire, And the covetous renounceth, yea, contemneth Jehovah.
hmr: Mi rilo chun a lungril thil dit zâwng chu a suong hlak a. Mi duâm chun LALPA chu a peithlâk a, a hmusit hlak.

en: The wicked, in the pride of his countenance, saith, He will not require it. All his thoughts are, There is no God.
hmr: Mi rilo chun chapo hmêl putin, “Iengkhawm mi ti hliek naw ni,” a ti hlak a, A ngaituona po po chu “Pathien hrim a um nawh,” ti ruok hi a nih.

en: His ways are firm at all times; Thy judgments are far above out of his sight: As for all his adversaries, he puffeth at them.
hmr: A umdânhai chu ieng lai khawmin a det zing a, I rorêlnahai chu chungtieng hlatakah, a hmu phâk nawah a um dai a: Ama dotuhai po po hlak chu a nuisan el a.

en: He saith in his heart, I shall not be moved; To all generations I shall not be in adversity.
hmr: A lungrila chun, “Châng naw ning: Suon po po chenin lungzîngin um naw ning,” a tih a.

en: His mouth is full of cursing and deceit and oppression: Under his tongue is mischief and iniquity.
hmr: A bau chu ṭawngse inphurna dâm, hlêmna dâm, suknawmnatna dâmin a sip a; A lei hnuoia chun thil suk- suolna le khawhlona a um a.

en: He sitteth in the lurking-places of the villages; In the secret places doth he murder the innocent; His eyes are privily set against the helpless.
hmr: Khaw tina inchân rûkna hmunhaiah a ṭhung hlak a, Hmun fienriela chun pawitâwk- lo mihai a that hlak a; A mitin iengkhawm thaw thei lo mi chu ân chânrûk zing hlak.

en: He lurketh in secret as a lion in his covert; He lieth in wait to catch the poor: He doth catch the poor, when he draweth him in his net.
hmr: Sakeibakneiin a pûka ân chân- rûk angin, ama chun fienriel- ah ân chânrûk zing hlak a; Mi rimsi man dingin an chân hlak a, Mi rimsi chu a man ngei a; chuongchun, a lênin a keihmang hlak.

en: He croucheth, he boweth down, And the helpless fall by his strong ones.
hmr: A bawkphêk a, a kûn a, Iengkhawm thaw thei lohai chu mi hrâthai sukthlûkin an um hlak.

en: He saith in his heart: God hath forgotten; He hideth his face, he will never see it.
hmr: A lungrila chun, “Pathienin a theinghil tah; A hmai a thup a, iengtika khawm hmu naw ni,” a ti hlak a.

en: Arise, O Jehovah; O God, lift up thy hand: Forget not the poor.
hmr: Aw LALPA, tho la, aw Pathien, i kut hang inlet ta, Mi rimsihai chu theinghil naw rawh.

en: Wherefore doth the wicked contemn God, And say in his heart, Thou wilt not require it?
hmr: Ieng dinga mi rilo chun Pathien hmusitin, A lungrilah, “Iengkhawm mi ti hliek naw ti nih,” a ti hlak am a na?

en: Thou hast seen it; for thou beholdest mischief and spite, to requite it with thy hand: The helpless committeth himself unto thee; Thou hast been the helper of the fatherless.
hmr: Hmu chu i hmu zing tah a, i kuta thung dingin buoina le lungzîngna chu în chik tah a, Iengkhawm thaw thei lo mi chu i kuomah a tlulût hlak a; Pa bo ṭhangpuitu i ni hlak kha.

en: Break thou the arm of the wicked; And as for the evil man, seek out his wickedness till thou find none.
hmr: Mi rilo, bân chu suktliek la, Mi suol chu a rîtlona zawng suok la, i hmu naw dêr hmakhat chun.

en: Jehovah is King for ever and ever: The nations are perished out of his land.
hmr: LALPA chu kumkhawtluonga dingin laltak a na, Hnam tin chu ama rama inthawkin bohmang an tih.

en: Jehovah, thou hast heard the desire of the meek: Thou wilt prepare their heart, thou wilt cause thine ear to hear;
hmr: LALPA, zainêmhai dit zâwng chu ngaipêk i ta; An lungril chu buotsai i ta, i na chu inngaitir bawk i tih:

en: To judge the fatherless and the oppressed, That man who is of the earth may be terrible no more.
hmr: Pa neilo le nêksâwrna tuorhai chu ro rêlpêkna dingin, Hnuoia mi chu ṭiumtaka an um nâwk ta nawna dingin.
